trends: There has been one other sighting in Dunseith
There were no other sightings in Dunseith on or around June 1st 2013
Summary: I have been watching strange lights for the past month and a half. These lights will suddenly appear out of no where, and at this time the light appears very bright and does not pulsate or blink it has a very bright white light, no sounds.
divs: Sighting Detailsfor the past month and a half, maybe two months I and my family have been watching strange lights that will appear out of nowhere. One is larger than the rest.(there are smaller lights that travel with it). Very bright like a star. It seems like it's cloaked and when it appears that's when it moves. Each time I've seen this it has been at different altitudes. for two weeks they were traveling south to southwest now they are traveling north to northwest. They do not pulsate or blink just a steady very bright glow.-It is the end of July and I am still watching these lights but at much higher altitude. I watch these travel higher up to a point where I cannot see them any longer. There is no sound.
